洪博培.definition: Jon Huntsman, Jr. (1960-), US politician, Governor of Utah 2005-2009, Ambassador to China 2009-2011

洪家.definition: the Hong family (household); Hung Gar Kung Fu - Martial Art

洪山.definition: Hongshan district of Wuhan city 武漢市|武汉市[Wu3 han4 shi4], Hubei

洪山區.definition: Hongshan district of Wuhan city 武漢市|武汉市[Wu3 han4 shi4], Hubei

洪廟村.definition: Hongmiao village in Mudan District 牡丹區|牡丹区[Mu3 dan5 Qu1] of Heze City, Shandong

洪森.definition: Hun Sen (1952-), prime minister of Cambodia since 1985

洪武.definition: Hongwu Emperor, also written Hung-wu Ti, reign name of first Ming emperor Zhu Yuanzhang 朱元璋[Zhu1 Yuan2 zhang1] (1328-1398), reigned 1386-1398, temple name 明太祖[Ming2 Tai4 zu3]

洪水滔滔.definition: (idiom) to have flooding over a vast area

洪水猛獸.definition: lit. severe floods and fierce beasts (idiom); fig. great scourges; extremely dangerous or threatening things

洪江.definition: Hongjiang, county-level city in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan; Hongjiang district of Huaihua city 懷化市|怀化市[Huai2 hua4 shi4], Hunan

洪江區.definition: Hongjiang district of Huaihua city 懷化市|怀化市[Huai2 hua4 shi4], Hunan

洪江市.definition: Hongjiang, county-level city in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan

洪洞.definition: Hongtong county in Linfen 臨汾|临汾[Lin2 fen2], Shanxi

洪洞縣.definition: Hongtong county in Linfen 臨汾|临汾[Lin2 fen2], Shanxi

洪流.definition: a powerful current; a flood (often fig., e.g. a flood of ideas)

洪湖市.definition: Honghu, county-level city in Jingzhou 荊州市|荆州市[Jing1zhou1 Shi4], Hubei

洪熙.definition: Hongxi Emperor, reign name of fourth Ming emperor Zhu Gaochi 朱高熾|朱高炽[Zhu1 Gao1 chi4] (1378-1425), reigned (1424-1425), temple name 明仁宗[Ming2 Ren2 zong1]

洪爐.definition: great furnace (metaphor for a place where character is forged)

洪福齊天.definition: flood of good fortune fills the heavens (idiom); a lucky sign

洪秀全.definition: Hong Xiuquan or Hung Hsiu-ch'üan (1814-1864), leader of the Taiping rebellion or Taiping Heavenly Kingdom

洪門.definition: see 天地會|天地会[Tian1 di4 hui4]

洪雅.definition: Hongya County in Meishan 眉山市[Mei2 shan1 Shi4], Sichuan

洪雅族.definition: Hoanya, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan

洪雅縣.definition: Hongya County in Meishan 眉山市[Mei2 shan1 Shi4], Sichuan
